input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineer .NET (Banking)

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, ITTConnect, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

ITTConnect is seeking a  Senior C# Developer with Azure to join one of our clients, which is a major IT Consulting firm HQ'd in Europe, with offices in 15 countries and over 10k employees. They are experts in tailored IT Services to Banks, Insurance and other Financial vertical clients.

This is an exciting opportunity to join a vibrant environment at one of their financial vertical accounts in Chicago (a large investment and capital management firm). Job is hybrid (3/2), and will be interacting with the client in a regular basis.

 Job Location: New York, NY. Hybrid, 3 days in the office, 2 days remote on average.

Requirements

 Technical Skills:

 Proficiency in C# Programming: Extensive experience in developing, testing, and deploying applications using C#.Understanding of .NET frameworks and .NET Core. Azure Expertis e (minimum 5 years): In-depth knowledge of Azure services: Azure Data Lakes, Azure Data Factory, Azure Functions, Azure SQL, Azure AI Search (formerly Azure Cognitive Search), Azure Logic Apps, Azure Entra ID (formerly Azure AD , critical ), Azure API Management, Azure SQL, and other cloud-based solutions. Ability to design and implement cloud architectures. Azure DevOps Expertise: Deep knowledge of Azure DevOps services and tools. Experience in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and deployment strategies. Familiarity with version control systems (like Git), build and release management, and automated depl oyment methodologies using Azure DevOps. SQL and Database Management: Strong skills in SQL programming, database design, and management. Experience with Microsoft SQL Server. API Development: Experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs. Knowledge of Front-End Technologies: Familiarity with front-end technologies and frameworks can be advantageous, though not always required.

 Leadership and Project Management Skills:

 Strategic Planning: Skill in aligning technological solutions with business objectives. Stakeholder Management: Proficiency in communicating with various stakeholders, including technical teams, management, and clients.

 Soft Skills:

 Problem-Solving Ability: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address complex technical challenges. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills for effective team collaboration and stakeholder interaction. Adaptability: Ability to adapt to rapidly changing technologies and environments. Creativity and Innovation: Aptitude for creative thinking in designing effective and innovative solutions.

 Optional but Beneficial:

Python or R knowledge for data analysis Relevant Degree: A bachelor s or master s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Certifications: Certifications in Azure (like Azure Solutions Architect Expert), C#, or SQL.

Software Engineer .NET (Banking)

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Software Engineer.NET (Banking)
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
optional_skills: Python or R knowledge for data analysis
Certifications in Azure, C#, or SQL
job_responsibilities: Design and implement cloud architectures using Azure services
Set up and manage CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and deployment strategies using Azure DevOps
Develop, test, and deploy applications using C#
Manage SQL databases and perform database design and management
Communicate effectively with various stakeholders including technical teams, management, and clients
output_json.travel_requirements: Hybrid, 3 days in the office, 2 days remote on average
